response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and profitability. With its innovative features and robust capabilities, this product is valued at $1,200,000 to us. Considering its immense value to you, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This special offer is designed to ensure that both parties benefit from this transaction. Please let me know if you require any further information or if you wish to proceed with this opportunity.", "product_price": 950000}
